wordpressPost.title: I wrote my first Medium article
wordpressPost.content:
The other day I published an article on Medium for the first time, under the Shopify UX publication.

It’s about accessible, mobile-friendly data tables, and the lessons that I learned making it. You can check it out here ğŸ™‚

Hopefully many more to come!
